      • setCurrentRevision

        public void setCurrentRevision(Revision currentRevision)
        Description copied from interface: Revisioned
        Set the current Revision.

        To preserve the existing revision chain, the new revision should point to the current revision using Revision.setPreviousRevision(Revision)

        Specified by:
        setCurrentRevision in interface Revisioned
        Parameters:
        currentRevision - The Revision to be set

      • newRevision

        public Revision newRevision()
        Description copied from interface: Revisioned
        Make a new Revision to mark structural changes to this workflow bean.

        The identifier of the new Revisioned.getCurrentRevision() will also be identifying the Revisioned workflow bean and be returned from Revisioned.getIdentifier().

        The new revision will include the previous Revision as Revision.getPreviousRevision() and Revision.getGeneratedAtTime() on the new revision will match the current GregorianCalendar by default.

        Specified by:
        newRevision in interface Revisioned
        Returns:
        The new Revisioned.getCurrentRevision(), for setting any further details.

      • newRevision

        public Revision newRevision(URI revisionIdentifier)
        Description copied from interface: Revisioned
        Make a new Revision to mark structural changes to this workflow bean with the given identifier.

        Revisioned.getIdentifier() will match the new identifier. The new Revisioned.getCurrentRevision() will include the previous revision as Revision.getPreviousRevision().

        Note, unlike the convenience method Revisioned.newRevision() this method will not update Revision.getGeneratedAtTime().

        Specified by:
        newRevision in interface Revisioned
        Parameters:
        revisionIdentifier - The new workflow identifier
        Returns:
        The new Revisioned.getCurrentRevision(), for setting any further details.

      • getCurrentRevision

        public Revision getCurrentRevision()
        Description copied from interface: Revisioned
        Get the current Revision metadata.

        The Revision typically contains information about when it was made, and links to the previous revision chain.

        Specified by:
        getCurrentRevision in interface Revisioned
        Returns:

      • getIdentifier

        public URI getIdentifier()
        Returns the identifier.

        The the default identifier is based on #getIdentifierRoot() plus a random UUID.

        Specified by:
        getIdentifier in interface Revisioned
        Returns:
        the identifier
        See Also:
        #setIdentifier(URI)}

      • setIdentifier

        public void setIdentifier(URI identifier)
        Set the identifier.

        This will delete any previous revisions in getCurrentRevision()

        Specified by:
        setIdentifier in interface Revisioned
        Parameters:
        identifier - the identifier
        See Also:
        getIdentifier(), getCurrentRevision()
